rooms.description: Wide entrance with reception area and storage closet.
Modern open space integrated with dining area; has south-facing window for Vastu compliance.
Fully equipped kitchen adjacent to the living room with north-east corner placement as per Vastu.
Spacious bedroom with attached bathroom; designed to be east-facing for positive energy.
Guest bedroom with south-west orientation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Attached to the master bedroom; ensures privacy and functionality.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom on first floor with ample storage.
Larger master suite with ensuite bathroom for additional comfort.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom.
